sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'
import FormLogin from './Component/FormLogin'
import { Routes, Route , BrowserRouter, Navigate, Outlet, Form} from 'react-router-dom' 
import Home from './Component/HomePage/Home'
import About from './Component/Header/About'
import NavBar from './Component/Header/NavBar'
import InfoProvider from './Context/InfoProvider'
import CreatePost from './Component/Blogs/CreatePost'
import PostDetail from './Component/Blogs/PostDetail'


const PrivateRoute = ({isUserAuth , ...props})=>{
  return (
    isUserAuth ?  <> <NavBar/> <Outlet/> </> : <Navigate replace to='/Login' />
  
    ) 
}

export default function App() {

  const [isUserAuth , setIsUserAuth] = useState(false)

  return (
    <>
<InfoProvider>

    <BrowserRouter>
      
<Routes>

<Route path='/login'  element={<FormLogin setIsUserAuth={setIsUserAuth}/>} />
            

        <Route path='/' element={<PrivateRoute isUserAuth={isUserAuth}/>} >
            <Route path='/' element={<Home/>} />
       </Route>

       <Route path='/' element={<PrivateRoute isUserAuth={isUserAuth}/>} >
       <Route path='/about'  element={<About/>}/>
       </Route>

       <Route path='/create' element={<PrivateRoute isUserAuth={isUserAuth}/>} >
            <Route path='/create' element={<CreatePost/>} />
       </Route>

       <Route path='/postDetail:id' element={<PrivateRoute isUserAuth={isUserAuth}/>} >
            <Route path='/postDetail' element={<PostDetail/>} />
       </Route>


</Routes>
    </BrowserRouter>


    </InfoProvider>
    </>
  )
}
